workflowContent: • Manually configure metadata for queries and persistence.
whatsNextContent: • Generate XML and java code on Summary view.

templateTip: • query - Create cache type metadata to use with queries only.
• store - Create cache type metadata to use with JDBC POJO store only.
• both - Create cache type metadata to use with query and store.

metadataManual.label: Metadata for
tip: Use following template for metadata:
<ul>
• query - Create cache type metadata to use with queries only.
• store - Create cache type metadata to use with JDBC POJO store only.
• both - Create cache type metadata to use with query and store.

metadataManual.label: Database schema
tip: Schema name in database.

metadataManual.label: Database table
tip: Table name in database.

metadataManual.label: Key type
tip: Key class used to store key in cache.

metadataManual.label: Value type
tip: Value class used to store value in cache.

metadataManual.label: Key fields
tip: Collection of key fields descriptions for CacheJdbcPojoStore.

metadataManual.label: Value fields
tip: Collection of value fields descriptions for CacheJdbcPojoStore..

metadataManual.label: Query fields
tip: Collection of name-to-type mappings to be queried, in addition to indexed fields.

metadataManual.label: Ascending fields
metadataManual.addTip: Add field to index in ascending order.
tip: Collection of name-to-type mappings to index in ascending order.

metadataManual.label: Descending fields
metadataManual.addTip: Add field to index in descending order.
tip: Collection of name-to-type mappings to index in descending order.

metadataManual.label: Text fields
metadataManual.addTip: Add field to index as text.
tip: Field to index as text.

metadataManual.label: Groups
tip: Collection of group indexes.

metadataDb.label: Database type
tip: Select database type to connect for loading tables metadata.

metadataDb.label: Database name
tip: Database name to connect for loading tables metadata.

metadataDb.label: Host
tip: IP address or host name where database server deployed.

metadataDb.label: Port
tip: Port number for connecting to database.

metadataDb.label: User
tip: User name for connecting to database.

metadataDb.label: Password
tip: Password for connecting to database.
Note, password would not be saved.
